turns.text: Im Lee with uh uh - Im over here in Plano Texas

-- that I have with my family and --
-- being able to you know work when I want and -
I think today the thing that I uh would appreciate the most - uh because my husband gets his medical through his company but we have --
turns.label: sd

turns.text: -- to pay for mine and were the only one Im the only one thats being insured and --

And I would - I really - and the way medical expenses are --
-- I think thats probably one of the biggest --
-- to ha- you need to have
Yeah Ill tell you what that is the single most --
turns.label: aa

turns.text: -- uh benefit that I that I enjoyed and I do miss because I looked into picking up some uh medical insurance for my just for my family you know just - and it is unbelievable --
-- how much you have to pay for it
Even at group rate I couldnt believe how much --

Right its going to hurt the city although uh I will personally tell you I used to work at bank and I would see the people come in when they were they would shut down to retool
